title: Miami zoo apologizes after treatment of kiwi bird outrages New Zealand
description: A Florida zoo has issued a “profound and sincere apology” after it sparked outrage from thousands of New Zealanders about its treatment of one of their national birds.

title: 95-year-old Australian woman dies after police shoot her with stun gun
description: A 95-year-old Australian woman died Wednesday, a week after a police officer shot her with a stun gun in a nursing home as she moved toward him using a walker and carrying a steak knife, in a tragedy that has outraged many Australians.

title: Typhoon Mawar barrels into Guam as a powerful Category 4 storm
description: The center of Typhoon Mawar struck Guam, pummeling the U.S. Pacific territory with high winds, heavy rains and a dangerous storm surge.

title: Russian court extends pre-trial detention of Evan Gershkovich
description: A Russian court has extended the pre-trial detention of Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich by another three months. The 31-year-old was arrested on espionage charges.

title: German police conduct raids on climate activists as impatience mounts
description: Authorities raided 15 properties across Germany on Wednesday and seized assets in an investigation into the financing of protests by the Last Generation climate activist group, prosecutors said — a move that comes as impatience with the organization’s tactics mounts.

title: U.S. distances itself from incursion into Russia that involved American Humvees
description: The United States has sought to distance itself from a dramatic raid into Russian territory by pro-Ukraine forces who appeared to use American equipment in their attack.

title: Watch owned by China’s last emperor sells for record $6.2 million
description: A luxury watch that belonged to Aisin-Gioro Puyi, the last emperor of China’s Qing Dynasty, sold for a record $6.2 million at a live auction in Hong Kong.

title: Woman dies from injuries after being struck by police escort for U.K. royal
description: The Duchess of Edinburgh expressed her condolences Wednesday after the death of an 81-year-old woman who was struck by a motorcycle that was part of the U.K. royal’s police escort.

title: Russia and China seal economic pacts despite Western disapproval
description: Russia’s prime minister signed a set of agreements with China on Wednesday during a trip to Beijing, describing bilateral ties at an unprecedented high, despite disapproval from the West of their relationship as the war in Ukraine dragged on.

title: Rare watch belonging to China's 'Last Emperor' sells for a record price at an auction
description: A watch that was once owned by the last emperor of China's Qing Dynasty, Aisin-Gioro Puyi, who was the subject of the Oscar-winning film, "The Last Emperor," sold for a record $6.2 million at a Hong Kong auction.
